mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY id) AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM QNA JOIN USER ON QNA.userId = USER.id ) A ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY id) AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM QNA JOIN USER ON QNA.userId = USER.id WHERE userId = ${userId}) A ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
SELECT * FROM QNA JOIN USER ON QNA.userId = USER.id WHERE QNA.id = ${id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA(id, userId, title, content) VALUES (QNA_ID_SEQ.nextval, ${userId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = ${id}
